data.name: TurbOT Racing - Nimbus City Tour
data.detailed_description:
Time to challenge the air boost capabilities from your TurbOT with these 2 brand new race tracks on the upper city of Nimbus!
Boost through fast traffic, use your turbines to dash on air and hear the new track themes while supporting TurbOT Racing game growth.

NOTES:
While on the game base tracks Air Boosting is an option, on Nimbus City this skill is almost obligatory.
To race on the new tracks you need at least 500 fans on your fanbase.

data.short_description: Time to challenge the air boost capabilities from your TurbOT with these 2 brand new race tracks on the upper city of Nimbus! Boost through fast traffic, use your turbines to dash on air and hear the new track themes while supporting TurbOT Racing development.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8, 10
  • Processor: i5 or equivalent
  • Graphics: GTX 750 or equivalent 1MB video minimal
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Sound Card: optional
  • Additional Notes: 3 button mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8, 10
  • Processor: i5 or equivalent
  • Graphics: GTX 750 or equivalent 1MB video minimal
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Sound Card: optional
  • Additional Notes: XBox 360 PC Controller or 3 button mouse
